channel.title: Good Time Boys Radio Show
channel.description: The Good Time Boys Radio Show is an engaging and hilarious look into the outdoor lifestyle featuring great interviews with celebrity guests and experts in field who talk hunting, fishing, healthy living and country music. The Good Time Boys Radio Show promotes hunting and fishing in a light hearted conversational style while keeping our audience up-to-date with outdoor news, upcoming events, new products and outdoor destinations.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Hunting, Fishing, and much more!
channel.itunes:summary: The Goodtime Boys Radio Show deals with enjoying life! Listen in for conversation with country music artists on hunting and fishing.
channel.itunes:author: Goodtime Boys

image.title: Good Time Boys Radio Show
image.description: A hilarious look into the outdoor lifestyle.

item.title: Good Time Boys Radio Show 115
item.description: Guest: Travis Altenhofen from Wild Excursions. Mark and Trepp talk tell some off-the-wall hunting stories, and discuss target practice during the summer months so you're prepared for fall deer season.
item.author: mark@goodtimeboysradio.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Guest: Travis Altenhofen from Wild Excursions, off-the-wall hunting stories, and target practice.
item.itunes:summary: Guest: Travis Altenhofen from Wild Excursions. Mark and Trepp talk tell some off-the-wall hunting stories, and discuss target practice during the summer months so you're prepared for fall deer season.
item.itunes:author: Good Time Boys Radio
